messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] drugs & school
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/4/2005 2:24:41 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, yoginiballerina@yahoo.com writes: hey,  except for Ritalin! as a public schooled kid who took
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2005 2:24:41 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,
yoginiballerina@... writes:

hey, except for Ritalin! as a public schooled kid who
took all the drugs I could find just to cope with the
boredom of waiting for high school to be OVER,


Just think, if The State had really
had control of us then, like they were supposed to, I
would have been on Ritalin way back then and never had
a kid!
Anna


Except I don't think ritalin is prescribed for boredom in high school.

I don't think it's for birth control either... You still would have been on
your own...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: drugs & school
messages.msgSnippet: ... though, which keeps all schoolkids off drugs. Sandra hey, except for Ritalin! as a public schooled kid who took all the drugs I could find just to
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>That was before they had the DARE program,
though, which keeps all
schoolkids
off drugs.

Sandra>>>>>>

hey, except for Ritalin! as a public schooled kid who
took all the drugs I could find just to cope with the
boredom of waiting for high school to be OVER, I
object to this! Just think, if The State had really
had control of us then, like they were supposed to, I
would have been on Ritalin way back then and never had
a kid!
Anna
